subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: Binghamton University fired basketball coach Mark Macon on Monday, cutting the final coaching tie to an era of legal, academic and N.C.A.A. issues under former coach Kevin Broadus.
snippet: Binghamton University fired basketball coach Mark Macon on Monday, cutting the final coaching tie to an era of legal, academic and N.C.A.A. issues under former coach Kevin Broadus.
